about_the_game:
Embark on a journey as one of the mighty defenders of the Northern Kingdom, Adam. With a trusty bow at your side and a wisdom of steel, your mighty quests will place you against the evil armies of goblins that seek to disrupt the peaceful lands that you swore to protect.

In this immersive VR tower defense archery game, be prepared to hold firm and aim high because thy shall slay with a rain of arrows in the sky.



🏹 DEFEND YOUR TOWER

Enemies are approaching and a single goblin stab can mean the end of your watch. Goblins are treacherous and will come at you from all angles, don't let your guard down and cover every angle possible. Stay focused and show them what true archery skill is by eliminating them all.



🏹 UPGRADE YOUR ARSENAL

You will be able to regain your composure in the warmth of the fireplace, away from the noises of conflict. Are you looking to enhance your weapon? Perhaps you wish to halt your enemy's assault with a new collection of ice arrows. The Blacksmith will assist you with any preparations before diving back into the fray.



🏹 WHISPERING VISITOR

There's something on the board, or better, someone. A mysterious White Raven looks at you and whispers in your ears. Maybe you should listen to his requests; you need all the help you can get. Dealing with the Goblin army alone will not be an easy task. Complete his requests and gather incredible rewards that will be essential to helping you win this war.





  • Engage in epic battles across diverse landscapes during a 24-day onslaught.
  • Defend your land with precision in a 360-degree battlefield as enemies close in from all directions.
  • Face a wide range of foes, from nimble scouts to heavily armored goblins, skilled archers and explosive kamikaze warriors.
  • Immerse yourself in a gripping adventure complete with a compelling storyline and engaging side quests.
  • Strategize and prioritize targets to maximize your score with an advanced scoring system.
  • Hone your archery skills with a range of bows and craft special arrows.
  • Compete for glory on the leaderboards and conquer the challenging HARD mode campaign.
  • Collect achievements as you progress and showcase your mastery as a sharpshooter.
  • Engage in the LAST STAND mode for an ongoing challenge with never-ending waves of enemies.

Join the Community: Share your feedback, be part of the ongoing evolution of this thrilling VR tower defense bow and arrow adventure. We continuously enhance the game, incorporating user suggestions and adding exciting new features!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti/AMD Radeon RX 470 or greater
  • Storage: 815 MB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest headset series
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIndows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590/AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060/AMD Radeon RX 480 or greater
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • VR Support: Meta Quest headset series

short_description: Draw your bow and defend your kingdom in this immersive VR tower defense archery game! Step into the role of the realm's finest archer as you face waves of attacks from cunning goblins and ruthless orcs. Test your skills, compete on leaderboards, and be part of the evolving community!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
